item.title: Need help with a simple command!
item.dc:creator: @99_stats_ftw 99 stats ftw
item.description:
@99_stats_ftw wrote:

I have this command if (playerCommand.startsWith("givepoints")) { try { final String[] args = playerCommand.split(" "); final String otherplayer = args[1]; final int point = Integer.parseInt(args[2]); for (final Player player : PlayerHandler.players) { if (player != null) { if (player.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(otherplayer)) { final Client c2 = (Client) player; c2.magePoints += point; //CHANGE THIS TO YOUR DONOR POINTS VARIABLE c.sendMessage("You have given " + otherplayer + ", " + point + " Donor points."); c2.sendMessage("You have been given " + point + " Donor points by " + c.playerName + "."); } } } } catch (final Exception e) { c.sendMessage("Wrong syntax! ::givepoints name amount"); } }

But it doesn’t allow me to use it if a player has a space in his or her username. So i can’t give the player “bro drew” any donor points, but i’m able to give “brodrew” donor points. _ and - don’t work in the command neither.
